children.string: [Know Thyself: What Medieval Christians Teach Us About Humility](https://mereorthodoxy.com/medieval-christians-humility/) #[[church/theology]] #[[inoreader]]

Excerpt:: “Are Americans humble?” a family member asked as I explained part of my dissertation on medieval humility to him. “Um… I don’t really think so. Not generally,” I awkwardly mumbled. This answer was unsatisfactory; firstly, because I bungled it.
